page.title: 06CALLINGTON PLAYING FIELDS
page.content: Callington has two{recreation grounds for general use. The field in Launceston Rd is{registered common {land,}that in Saltash Rd was purchased by the urban council in l9l9. Both have children's play areas and rough football pitches, also{allotment {gardening plots}which are rented from the parish council by keen growers of flowers and vegetables. Only a small strip of the Launceston Rd field is within this block. The{sports fields}of the comprehensive school cover several acres behind the school.{Kit Hill}was recently given by HRH Prince Charles to the county for a country park. It has been used as a public recreation area since l928.The roads and pathways are now in a very dilapidated state.
